results.title: An Impression of John Steinbeck
results.creator_credit: Donald Wrye and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
A series of vignettes of the life and writings of the late John Steinbeck, one of the best known contemporary American authors. It includes recollections by persons who knew Steinbeck at different times during his life and some of his own comments about himself and his writing. Features Henry Fonda as the voice of Steinbeck.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Donald Wrye and United States Information Agency

results.title: Blaine Johnson
results.creator_credit: Gordon Weisenborn, Sarah Toughill, Werner Schumann and Guggenheim Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Pilot, specialist in farm technology and “crop duster”, Blaine Johnson’s knowledge and study of the latest developments of agriculture benefit the many farms he visits as a duster pilot. Johnson places his skills at the service of the farming community who need him to combat the many kinds of insects which can destroy a crop overnight.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gordon Weisenborn, Sarah Toughill, Werner Schumann and Guggenheim Productions

results.title: Reverend Leon Sullivan
results.creator_credit: Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Through his inspired leadership, the Rev. Sullivan has been able to redeem and transform thousands of school dropouts and potential criminals. Describes the Opportunities Industrialisation Centre which he organised in order to train people of the ghetto to become skilled workers. Narrated by Barry Sullivan.

results.title: Walter Spiel
results.creator_credit: James Fitzpatrick and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
A study of the 62 year old news vendor who sells American and foreign newspapers and magazines at his stand on a Los Angeles street corner. The camera establishes the relationship between “Willy” and his consumers as they come to his stand and look through their choices before purchase.

results.title: Lyn McLain
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Lyn McLain is the founder and director of the District of Columbia Youth Symphony Orchestra, one of the most extraordinary musical groups in the United States. It is made up of children, aged from eight to seventeen years, from all walks of life, who voluntarily give up their Saturdays to study music.
results.description:

results.title: Hayes Jones
results.creator_credit: Jerry Forman, Hugh King, Daniel Ruffini and Allegro Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of New York’s new Commissioner of Recreation, a newly created post. Hayes Jones, former Olympic high hurdler, administers 900 parks, is activity director for eight million people and supervisor of 12,000 employees. We follow him through a typical working day.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jerry Forman, Hugh King, Daniel Ruffini and Allegro Film Productions

results.title: Floyd Hyde
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
A portrait of the dynamic 45 year old artist-attorney, who is the popular and progressive Mayor of the city of Fresno, California. This is a large city with a population of 160,00 whose economy is dependent on the income generated by the fertile surrounding rural areas. Narrated by Barry Sullivan.

results.title: Dr Robert Simpson
results.creator_credit: Kenneth Vose, Harold Mayer and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
Dr Robert Simpson is the director of the National Hurricane Watch Centre at the University of Miami. He discusse his responsibility for tracking hurricanes which originate in the south east Atlantic and for warning the public along the Eastern Atlantic Coast on the intensity and course which the hurricanes will takes. Narrated by Barry Sullivan. Written by Kenneth Vose.

results.title: Dr DeBakey
results.creator_credit: Harold Mayer and Harold Mayer Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “One Man”.
The story of Dr Michael DeBakey, world renowned heart specialist and innovator of new techniques in surgery and new materials for building body organs. We follow Dr DeBakey from early morning through the entire day, forever fighting the clock.
